DOC.brief_summary: Previous study demonstrate sniff dog identify cancer patient healthy subject sniff exhale breath air blood serum urine feces . It hypothesize sniff dog may use tool screen cancer patient health examination . Trained dog sniff serum participant attend annual health examination identify potential high risk subject , result compare outcome traditional health examination , high risk subject follow periodically least five year .
DOC.brief_title: The Suitability Sniff Dog Tool Screening Tumors
DOC.criteria: old 20 year currently without cancer diagnose pathological examination allow study team examine his/her case history incoming record cancer patient pathological diagnosis allow study team examine his/her case history incoming record
